channel.title: The Invaders: Source
channel.description:
I've found a new multiplayer mod for Half-Life 2 on ModDB and it looks pretty cool, just thought I'd post it here as I think everyone here might enjoy it. :slight_smile:
It comes out on July 4th according to the website.
[url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/the-invaders-source']https://www.moddb.com/mods/the-invaders-source[/url]
EDIT: Just found out it is headed by one of the GoldenEye: Source developers, should be good. :smiley:

item.title: The Invaders: Source
item.dc:creator: Timmeh2k9
item.description:
I agree that the level design is a bit off, I hope that they continue to support it after release.

Read full topic

item.title: The Invaders: Source
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
It’s a nice looking mod that is way under the radar. However they still have a lot of work to do on their level design, especialy on their robotic class.

Read full topic
